secondaryCurrencyCode.description: secondary currency code in mix currency flow

creationTime.description: The creation time in long seconds.

payShippingInSecondaryCurrencyCode.description: secondary currency code in mix currency flow

sourceSystem.description: The system where the order originated.

dynamicProperties.description: Read-only list of dynamic properties for the order along with meta-data.

id.description: The ID of the dynamic property.

label.description: The label of the dynamic property.

value.description: The value of the dynamic property.

payments.description: Payment details for the order, including additional properties specific to the payment type.

PONumber.description: Purchase order number for invoice payment. Payment type:invoice

amount.description: Amount authorized from the payment group.

balance.description: Total available balance on the gift card.

uiIntervention.description: This decides whether the client has to do some intervention for payment. e.g. SOP.

isAmountRemaining.description: A boolean to decide if more payment can be made from this payment group.

paymentState.description: The state of the payment group. e.g. AUTHORIZED.

approvers.description: List of approvers of the organization.

shoppingCart/order.description: The shopping-cart or order contents of the current order.

items.description: The array of products in the shopping cart.

deactivationDate.description: The deactivation date in ISO format.

rawTotalPrice.description: The raw price of the product.

addOnItem.description: Whether the child item is an add-on (externally configured) or not (externally configured).

daysInMonth.description: mention which days of Month schedule should run. values can be 1 to 31.

giftWithPurchaseType.description: The type of the gift. (sku, product)

giftWithPurchaseDetail.description: String identifying the free gift, usually the repository id of the gift type.

promotionId.description: The gift with purchase promotion id

giftWithPurchaseIdentifier.description: An identifier used to track which gift selection in the promotion this is.  It allows the commerce item marker to link to this one.

orderLocale.description: The locale in which order submitted.

giftWithPurchaseOrderMarkers.description: gift with purchase order marker information

quantity.description: The total quantity of sku for this gift selection.

selectedQuantity.description: The quantity of free sku for this gift selection that has already been selected by the Shopper and added to the order.

removedQuantity.description: The amount of free quantity that has since been manually removed by a Shopper.

data.description: Gift hash code to track which gift selection in the promotion this is.  It allows the commerce item marker to link to this one.

autoRemove.description: Flag to indicate whether free gifts should be auto removed if the promotion no longer qualifies.

giftDetail.description: String identifying the free gift, usually the repository id of the gift type.

automaticQuantity.description: The quantity of free sku for this gift selection that has already been auto added to the order.

giftType.description: The type of the gift. (sku, product)

failedQuantity.description: The amount of automatic free quantity that failed to be added to the cart due to some pricing error, e.g. invalid site.

value.description: The gift with purchase promotion id

targetedQuantity.description: The quantity of free sku for this gift selection that has already been targeted and made free by the calculator in the order.
